Part Three - Missed Approach Logic
The final installment of this three-part series covers missed approach logic... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Sep2018/FMSLogicSep18]]>
GoDirect Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Sep2018/GDFSSep18]]> Flight Bag Pro Version 1.5
Users are now able to view Jeppesen Terminal Charts and file eAPIS for flights leaving and entering the United States within the Flight Bag Pro app.... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Sep2018/GDFSSep18]]> Service Information Letter Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Sep2018/SILBriefSep18]]> Removal of Nav DB Procedures due to Missed Approach Point Prior to Runway Threshold
Honeywell has released a new Service Information Letter to notify NG FMS operators that certain procedures have been removed from their databases... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Sep2018/SILBriefSep18]]>
